025
026package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.taglets;
027
028import java.util.EnumSet;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Optional;
031
032import javax.lang.model.element.Element;
033import javax.lang.model.element.ExecutableElement;
034
035import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.BaseConfiguration;
036import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.Content;
037import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.CommentHelper;
038import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.Utils;
039import org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.doclets.toolkit.util.DocFinder.Result;
040
041import com.sun.source.doctree.DocTree;
042import com.sun.source.doctree.SeeTree;
043import jdk.javadoc.doclet.Taglet.Location;
044
045/**
046 * A taglet that represents the {@code @see} tag.
047 */
048public class SeeTaglet extends BaseTaglet implements InheritableTaglet {
049
050    public SeeTaglet() {
051        super(DocTree.Kind.SEE, false, EnumSet.allOf(Location.class));
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public Output inherit(Element owner, DocTree tag, boolean isFirstSentence,
056            BaseConfiguration configuration) {
057        CommentHelper ch = configuration.utils.getCommentHelper(owner);
058        var path = ch.getDocTreePath(tag);
059        configuration.getMessages().warning(path,
060            "doclet.inheritDocWithinInappropriateTag");
061        return new Output(null, null, List.of(), true /*
062                                                       * true, otherwise there
063                                                       * will be an exception up
064                                                       * the stack
065                                                       */);
066    }
067
068    @Override
069    public Content getAllBlockTagOutput(Element holder, TagletWriter writer) {
070        Utils utils = writer.configuration().utils;
071        List<? extends SeeTree> tags = utils.getSeeTrees(holder);
072        Element e = holder;
073        if (utils.isMethod(holder)) {
074            var docFinder = utils.docFinder();
075            Optional<
076                    Documentation> result = docFinder
077                        .search((ExecutableElement) holder,
078                            m -> Result.fromOptional(extract(utils, m)))
079                        .toOptional();
080            if (result.isPresent()) {
081                ExecutableElement m = result.get().method();
082                tags = utils.getSeeTrees(m);
083                e = m;
084            }
085        }
086        return writer.seeTagOutput(e, tags);
087    }
088
089    private record Documentation(List<? extends SeeTree> seeTrees,
090            ExecutableElement method) {
091    }
092
093    private static Optional<Documentation> extract(Utils utils,
094            ExecutableElement method) {
095        List<? extends SeeTree> tags = utils.getSeeTrees(method);
096        return tags.isEmpty() ? Optional.empty()
097            : Optional.of(new Documentation(tags, method));
098    }
099}
